title: Flytoget - Technical Assistance Type 78
content: RailAdvice provided technical assistance for Flytoget's acquisition of eight new Type 78 train sets from the Spanish manufacturer CAF. The trains, with a top speed of 245 km/h, are the fastest in Norway. Lars Bengtsson, a RAMS and LCC engineer, was involved in verifying maintenance activities, planning to reduce workshop time, and quality-assuring documentation. Erlend Rehn was the technical project manager for the project.
